website_summaries.verdict: A deal for the price with lots of features.
pros: Same waterproof coating and rating as more expensive brands
Easy-to-use buttons allow you skip, play, and pause your music
Provides up to eight hours of music
cons: The repetitive "low battery" notifications bother some users

customer_reviews.title: My go to earphones now
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite. Girlfriend got them for me so we can call each other especially since we drive and move quite a bit and our hands are always busy. Loved the pair she got me that I bought myself another pair. Pros: Easy to use if you're not familiar with wireless earphones Sound is great and loud Lasts for hours and is really quick to charge Cons: My dog thought it was a chew toy Tip: uses any micro USB charger and charge these earphones before going out!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite gym buddy!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Great price and they arrived quickly. I'm not a professional in the music industry, but the sound quality seems great to me. Also, they stay in my ears comfortably when I run at the gym which is what I got them for. They connected to my phone via Bluetooth easily. They also came with a little charging cord, instructions, and a cute round hard case to keep them in. Battery life seems good so far. I can go multiple workouts in a row and not have to recharge. I would order these again or recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Woods

customer_reviews.title: even nicer
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable because they use soft silicone for the parts. they're nice to touch. the sound quality is great- even when im leaf blowing. they come in a sweet zippered case big enough to hold them, the additional additional memory foam tips. memory foam. love it. you could fit some other small things in that case, as well. It has a key ring connector. No cords not hanging down so i can inadvertently and repeatedly pull the buds out of my ears. when im busy. i cant say how long the battery lasts, but it outlasted me a full morning of yard work.
customer_reviews.author: marypatric

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for 20 bucks.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones. They have mid-quality range sound, about equal skullcandy level, but not quite on par with bose or beats. They battery lasts long enough as long as you remember to charge them after use they last through 1 or 2 good listening sessions. Nice and loud. And fairly comfortable, though the ear loop thing is pretty much pointless. The in-ear buds do all the holding and the ear loop is more just for looks.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus  W. Jaurigue

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have had these headphones for about a week now and love them. They function great, and sound awesome. Pros: They sound great They fit well, and come with different size ear pieces you can change out They are rechargeable and the battery lasts a long time They come with a semi-hard case that also stores a charging cable They are comfortable They are sweat proof They stay put while jogging or riding my bike Cons: None, I would strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andy S.

customer_reviews.title: Just Wow.
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited for this order and it did deliver. Wow. Love the look and feel of it. I like the way it feels when wearing. It looks like I am wearing a beats but minus the cost. Pairing the device was a breeze. Sound quality is amazing. Wire is perfect size and stays away from obstructing. This is going to be my go to set for the gym. I wore it to the gym and it stays in place and didn't even feel I am wearing it. I highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: John Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I received was defective but after contacting the company they made sure to give me a full refund and sent me a new pair that I have not had any issues with. They work great and I've had them for almost a year now. The battery life is the same as when I received them and the sounds quality has remained great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Stays on!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones and they stay on no matter what kind of exercise I do. If other headphones have trouble staying on when you're active, these will fit you really well! Worth the 20 bucks I dropped!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Company does not honor the warranty...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones worked for a couple of months and then died. They will no longer take a charge or operate. Although the company did answer my email and ask for my address on November 26th, they have not honored their warranty; and they have not answered 3 follow up emails. Basically money thrown down the drain. I am going to try and call Amazon corporate to complain and ask for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at the end of May 2016 and they failed at the end of September 2016 (4 months). I had them in while working out and they all of a sudden died and wouldn't come back on. Usually before turning off they will tell you they have low battery and are powering down, but that didn't happen this time. I plugged them in to charge them and when I went to unplug them they had melted to the charging cable and I had hot liquid plastic all over my hands. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: John Bannon

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth Earphones
customer_reviews.text: These bluetooth earphones work very well! They are comfortable, stay in place, come with adjustable ear buds, and look great! They have a long battery life, good sound quality, and have good sound isolation as well. I own a set of Otium wireless headphones as well and love them! I would highly recommend this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: died ofter 5 days
customer_reviews.text: these worked fine for 5 days, now they won't charge or power on. tried to contact the seller via amazon, got the following reply: "Your e-mail(s) to OtiumDirect (bws9jz63t0wxckr@marketplace.amazon.com) cannot be delivered because there was a problem with the recipient's email system. " i'll be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Great quailty, bad if you have small ears.
customer_reviews.text: Volume and quality great. The problem I have with them is if you have small ears they don't do a very good job staying in. That's the main reason I got them, for them to stay put. But that is a challenge. The rubber band doesn't secure them enough and the ear bud doesn't stay in my ear canal all the way. If the band was adjustable then it would prob work ok.
customer_reviews.author: Pepsi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome active earbuds
customer_reviews.text: GREAT EARBUDS!!!! Took these on a seven mile run and they fit the ear great with awesome sound quality. Would definitely recommend. Great for runs or just casual wearing. I can’t believe how good the sound is. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Maemura

customer_reviews.title: They're beautiful and sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: They look at how it appears on the photos and are worth it. So far, it sounds great with no problems. Also, to connect it with phones or laptops, there were no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jashly

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Sound cut in and out constantly , no matter how close the headphones were to the computer or phone they were being used with. Sound quality wasn't great either.
customer_reviews.author: Kami Mijares

customer_reviews.title: Great expectations leads to greater disappointments.
customer_reviews.text: These are it! I said to myself......based on all of the good reviews I've read and some videos on youtube giving these headphones 5 stars. Well, it was not my case, I got to use them once and the second time they died on me. Went to Amazon for a full refund. I do not know if I had a bad factory product but that was my experience. Will keep looking ..........
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio J. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great until they stopped pairing after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Loved them until they stopped working after 4-5 months. The device is fully charged, but refuses to go into pairing mode (despite holding the power button down for 6.5 seconds as instructed); this means my computer nor my phone will recognize them. Super disappointed. A few other reviews have had this issue. I followed the advice in the review and attempted to contact customer service 72 hours ago and have yet to hear back.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M James

customer_reviews.title: Not for small ears!
customer_reviews.text: These don’t work for smallish ears. The over the ear hooks were bigger than my ear, and the smallest plastic bud suctioned itself into my ears in that scary way that makes it feel like it’s doing permanent damage to the eardrums on the way out. They’re too heavy, and they aren’t magnetized, so the slide around your neck when your not using them. The one star I give these is for the sound. It is AMAZING. TL;dr Too big for small ears, need a magnet, incredible sound. So if you have big ears, these might be for you.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Kenerson

customer_reviews.title: Not sweatproof
customer_reviews.text: Barely lasted a month. Bought them for my sister and she Received them August 1 and not it's September 12 and they sound broken already. I tried them out and they do sound staticy it's pretty pathetic. I will not be buying from these people again. And she uses them for their intended purpose. She uses them at the gym and I believe this does NOT make them sweat proof.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Was great then one day right side stopped working can’t answer phone so I trashed them don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Steven Burris

customer_reviews.title: Good for exercise or quiet use
customer_reviews.text: These are very good Bluetooth headphones. I use them for listening to music, audible books, podcasts, or radio. The volume is very good and the quality is very good. I've found them helpful to use when I've running in any kind of weather. Rain, snow, or cold--the weather is OK for these. They're also good for when I am sitting at my desk at work. I've bought a few extra so I can have one at my office that is there all the time and one at home so I don't forget to have them around when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Papa

customer_reviews.title: Stops working at 2 months - do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in this product, especially because it is an Amazon "Best Seller". I bought this 2 months ago and today it stopped working. It was working great until it just stopped. I had charged it and turned it on today, it turned on and I heard "Power On" but then after that nothing. I thought that maybe it wasn't charged enough, even though I had just charged it. I plug it in and the light doesn't come on. No red or blue light. Holding down the power button doesn't do anything. I am so mad that Amazon recommends this and it breaks after 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jaikey333

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use, comfortable and lightweight. I like the over-the-ear hooks and having the ear buds connected rather than in two pieces, because it's easy to take one out of an ear to talk with someone without worrying about losing it. The battery lasts for several hours, and charging is quick. Sound quality is great too. They're so inexpensive, I bought two so I can keep one freshly charged at all times.
customer_reviews.author: MEM

customer_reviews.title: Headphones I Actually Like!
customer_reviews.text: Holy smokes. I don't know much about electronics or in this case, headphones, but I really liked these! My BF has similar headphones, Beats by Dre, and he tried mine out. He was extremely impressed with these considering the price I had paid for them. I was skeptical at first when I put them on because the rubber ear band part cannot be custom molded to fit my ear. However, after actually wearing them running, high-knees, burpees, and jumping jacks, they never once fell off. Also, it came with a case and now I don't have to worry about these getting squished in my gym bag. Totally worth it the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this four months ago and it's already defective. The volume button came off. Be aware to not buy this product. Most of the reviews are fake. I requested for a refund but the company denies it.
customer_reviews.author: mcp

customer_reviews.title: Junk dont buy will break after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I spent months jumping from earphones to earphones looking for wireless ear phones that not only sound good but last longer than 2hrs. I use these to work out sometimes my gym sessions can go for hrs these not only sound amazing but I can go 3 maybe 4 gym sessions without charging that's ridiculous!!!! Great buy and a steal at this price. Edit 03/09/2018 stopped working lights wont turn on or wont charge.its only been 6 months since I bought them I used them daily and took care of them. Never over charged them or miss handled them. Dont buy save your money
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great support and product
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these. Sound quality was great. Sound isolation was great. I talk on the phone for several hours daily for work. Really happy with them...Until...About a month after purchase, the sound started clipping in and out. Now it's a gamble if they are going to work on a client call or break up to the point I can't understand anything. They aren't reliable, and I can't depend on them for calls. I really wish I could do 5 stars here. If it's a faulty set and I can get a replacement, I'll definitely update the review. Edit: Company reached out with a replacement very quickly. A few months later, I've had no issues. Would recommend fully!
customer_reviews.author: _jazt10

customer_reviews.title: The best wireless headphones I have EVER used
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love love love these headphones. I had a pair that I lost recently while on the train and I was so upset because I love them so much. BUT they are super affordable, so re-purchasing didn't break the bank! In fact, I bought two pairs this time because my husband always gets the crappiest headsets and I told him he had to try these out. Battery lasts days, sound quality is awesome, and noise cancelling. They also come with 3 extra ear bud sizes, even a REALLY tiny pair that my friend has to use because she has abnormally small ear canals. I can't believe how inexpensive they are for what you get! Definitely RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: Londyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for sports
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I have used bluetooth headphones before and I found they would not work well while bike riding--they would cut in and out frequently. I figured it may have been because my iPhone app for cycling was possibly hogging bandwidth. I'm probably wrong but it was so noticeable I used some wired plugs instead. Then they were getting finicky due to corrosion on the plugs so I tried bluetooth again. These work great. I've been using them for several weeks and I haven't had any issues with them on bike rides. I've tried them once or twice while running and they stay in--great for running and cycling.
customer_reviews.author: Bmcgnh

customer_reviews.title: Curse my unreasonable expectations of function!
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I like my electronics to last at least two years, and this only made it about a quarter of that time, so I'm dissatisfied. But, hey, you might feel differently. It's all about that personal preference. If you don't want to replace your headphones every six months, these won't be right for you. If it bothers you that the headphones will stop accepting a charge after that time, and, instead, you'll have some nice plastic and rubber ear accessories that can't even power on, you might like to look elsewhere. If you want to pay $40 a year for headphones, these are for you. $20 every six months, and you can have fully functional headphones! You do you!
customer_reviews.author: S. Thygesen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Audio Quality
customer_reviews.text: I brought these by accident. I was looking at some beats by dre earbuds and somehow landed on these. The symbols on the buds look like beats. When arrived i was pissed. I was thinking i just got taken advantage of. I looked at my order and yup this what i purchased. Now i had very low expectations for these headphones (wrong move lol) these earbuds are FANTASTIC, the quality of the sound is probably the best in earbuds i have ever hear. Definitely worth triple the price of what they sell for. Also they fit nice and snugg and comfy in your ear. Best mistake i ever made. I would strongly recommend these earbuds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month!
customer_reviews.text: The headphones worked fine for a few weeks. About 1 month in they stopped working all together. I realize they’re inexpensive, but I expected a little better quality. Also, the quality of the mic on calls is low. I had multiple people tell me they could barely hear me, so I stopped using it for phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: #1 Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, Flimsy Product
customer_reviews.text: Well, these earphones were comfy, easy to set up, had pretty good quality sound and worked well. Until they didn't. The right earphone just quit working while I was listening to a podcast. No scrunching them up, no crimping the cord. They just up and 'half quit'. Probably an unfortunate occurrence and maybe not typical of the product, but I'll certainly be buying a sturdier set next time. UPDATE: Otium contacted me via email. They offered to send me a new replacement set of earphones with no questions asked. I've raised my rating of the product from two to four stars as a result. That is some solid customer service.
customer_reviews.author: christopher j hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Favorite workout headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great for working out or around the house. They stay in my ears even when running as fast as I possibly can. The hook around the ear technology banishes any issues of the earbuds falling out. They are water-resistant (I haven't tried plunging them in water, but a little rain hasn't hurt them). The color is pretty (I bought the pink), and doesn't wear out after use. The sound quality is awesome and never cuts out. They easily pair through Bluetooth to my smartphone and laptop. I couldn't be happier and am astonished at how cheap they are.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Miller

customer_reviews.title: They lasted so briefly, that they almost seem disposable...
customer_reviews.text: Liked them well enough for the price...until they died on me less than three months after purchase for no discernable reason. I haven't reached out to customer support yet, but the fact that they simply stopped with no warning was very upsetting. It doesn't respond when I click the power button or when I plug it into my computer or a wall plug for charging. When plugged in for charging, the light goes to red briefly before going blue; which is not how it worked before today. In the past my wireless headphones have been replaced due to simple loss, and this is the first time one died on me, much less so quickly. Very dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at a respectable price
customer_reviews.text: Recently my gym headphones broke, so I went on a mission to find an inexpensive replacement. I am somewhat of a music snob and love my Bang & Olufsen H9i and Bowers & Wilkins PI4's, but just cant see wearing these to the gym. I read the reviews on the Otium headphones and thought what the heck, give them a try. I am pleased that I did. Very respectable sound and nice fit. I highly recommend a pair and will probably purchase another pair as a backup for the gym. Definitely can not go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: wrandy407

customer_reviews.title: Good for listening to audio
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use at the gym to listen to music while lifting weights and running. They work well and I enjoy them. When I was doing circuit training g the left side kept falling out and that drove me crazy, but that was mostly when I was jumping or doing larger movements. They do not come out when I run. I have had some trouble with people hearing me on a phone call so I don't like to use them for anything but listening to music and podcasts.
customer_reviews.author: Shellbear22

customer_reviews.title: even better than mpow brand
customer_reviews.text: these are even better than the 2 mpow brand sets I still have. the battery/play time on this set is so much longer and the cord between the earphones is longer. I use these everywhere: work, gym, sleep, doing laundry.... I even fall asleep with them- great for audiobooks! My only pet peeve is the bright power light but a small piece of electrical tape covers it. other/mpow brand: Mpow D7 Bluetooth Headphones Sport, 10H Playtime & IPX7 Waterproof Wireless Headphones Sport Earbuds W/Bass Stereo Sound, Running Headphones Bluetooth Earphones W/CVC 6.0 Noise Cancelling Mic, Grey
customer_reviews.author: Pauline R.

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed with this product as well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after my wireless Beats failed to work after less than 5 months of use. I opted to try an less expensive product, Otium's version of a wireless headset. Unfortunately these won't charge any longer. I plug them in to charge for hours, and they are always "battery low" after charging for hours. They simply won't hold a charge. I am beginning to believe no vendor can make a quality wireless headset that can last at least a year. I am so disappointed with this product as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Spoke too soon...
customer_reviews.text: ***REVISED*** Initially, I gave this product five stars and a glowing review. Sadly just two days after I wrote my review the left side of the earbud stopped working. I've had them less than a month and a half. So disapointed! Im now stuck with another earbud that stopped working and I can't return. **********************Original************************** I've gone through dozens of headphones and earbuds over the years and... So far so good. I've had these for over a month and I love them. Great sound for both media and phone calls. They remain securely in place while working out and they are durable against sweat and all. For what its worth, I'd take these over the Beats any day.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Yas

customer_reviews.title: Quit working inside of 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Sound was great and now just 2 months and 2 weeks later they No longer work; they just quit working and won’t even charge and the warranty is only for 30 days. Kept them in the case, charged only the way they said, and just really took care of them to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: morgana909

customer_reviews.title: Instantly broke.
customer_reviews.text: The left ear phone popped in half while pressing it into my ears. Oh well I guess I get what I pay for.
customer_reviews.author: detroitartis

customer_reviews.title: Maybe replacement will work for more than 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: So I used theae headphones a lot. I paired with almost every device in my apartment. The PS4 did not work but thats because the PS4 can't use BT headphones (which I didn't know) but every single thing worked flawlessly. Sound is great. Then one day I fired uo spotify and it just sounded like the speakers were blown. I never listened to the speakers at a bolume to bust the speakers. Always under half my iPhone XR volume. No idea why it happened. I asked for a return through Amazon and will change stars if the next one works. UPDATE: the replacement headphones do exactly the same thing. Very unhappy and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Ferriera

customer_reviews.title: Hip earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as a replacement for another headset that stopped working. Function as intended, found no issues. Holding the button to turn it on or off or just changing the song works without any concerns. It doesn't completely cancel noise so it's good for those who want some environmental awareness. When the volume goes to high, it will inform the user of the risks of hearing noises loudly. This can get annoying as you need to press okay on the notification to increase the volume. Once if reaches the highest volume, it will beep loudly which really hurts and its annoying. The charge takes 2:30 hours but it really last a long time so l can't complain about it.
customer_reviews.author: Fidel Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: They're cheap and they work, and that sums it up
customer_reviews.text: Obviously these can't compete with high end headphones! For the most part, these headphones meet my expectations. There are a few reasons I deducted 2 stars. First, they at times skip during the jostling of going on a run, which surprised me. Also, they get pretty uncomfortable if you wear them for too long. Finally, the sound quality is a little worse than I expected, even for a budget set. Thankfully they have consistently stayed connected with no drops. Overall, if you're looking for an acceptable set of headphones without breaking the bank, these are worth a shot. Just keep your expectations realistic!
customer_reviews.author: AggieJay

customer_reviews.title: I really like them
customer_reviews.text: They fit comfortably and sound good. They also hold a charge for a long time. I like that they are ear buds but have a soft hook that fits over the ears as well. I've had the problem with ear buds that the tend to fall out, especially when I'm jogging. These headphones stay put. I also like that the headphones speak to you instead of just using tones. For example, my last pair of bluetooth headphones would beep once when connected and beep twice when disconnected. These headphones actually speak the words when they are connected or not. They also come with a nice carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Laney Silbert

customer_reviews.title: Effective Headphones, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of these headphones in 2018 and they had great sound quality and battery life. Multiple sizes of earbuds are also included and that really helped since the default size is a bit too small for me (it would often slip out of my ear). The headphones started to have no sound after 1 1/2 years of constant use, so I bought a second pair. This one malfunctioned right off the bat, but I contacted customer service over email and they sent a replacement right away after the troubleshooting didn't seem to work. The replacement worked perfectly, just like my first pair. Still using them and will continue supporting this brand in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Alan X.

customer_reviews.title: Otium Bluetooth Headphones - Work nicely, pair easily, decent battery life
customer_reviews.text: I keep two pairs of these on hand. They work quite well, and sound just as good as any other Bluetooth headset. Bluetooth isn't a great transmission system for high quality audio, no matter what brand you buy. The limitation is Bluetooth, not the headset. With that in mind, I can't agree with people who claim other Bluetooth earbuds sound much better. From AirPods to Bose Bluetooth, they all suffer the same quality issues. Ignoring the deficiencies in Bluetooth transmission, the sound that you get has decent bass, and highs. The volume level is fine, and the battery life is about 8 hours. I'd recommend these, especially at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: No longevity.  Died and company won't do anything about it
customer_reviews.text: Lasted just over 2 years being used seldomly and then won't turn on. Learned my lesson buying a no name brand. Contacted Otium and their response was "Sounds like a wiring issue that can't be fixed" Edit 3/13/20 - Company reached out only after I left a negative review and offered a replacement. Have received them and they are working like usual. But for how long? Cannot recommend due to the customer service I was offered when originally contacting them with the issue. Edit 3/31/20 - The company has now offered me a full refund in exchange for deleting my review....Very shady practices. Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.author: Adam Miller

customer_reviews.title: Got these yesterday and used them all day today. Super impressed!
customer_reviews.text: When ordering these I was thinking low budget airbuds. I was pleasantly surprised when I started using them. Straight out of the box I was impressed by the packaging. Definitely now low end. I particularly liked the extra pair of ear tips included. Most ear buds include three sizes. Having very small inner ears, even the smallest is a tight fit. These include an extra small pair as well. Those fit me perfectly! I took it for a run in the park and enjoyed the excellent sound (I'm not an audiophile) and the way they stayed on my ears. I used them later when laying down for a nap and the were very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: sammy

customer_reviews.title: The sound is good and the comfort is great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these Otium headphones. I wanted a second pair so that I always have the extra pair charged up. I have tried many others and the sound quality and battery life were just not equal to the Otium. There are many types on the market now that do not have a cord connecting the two earpieces. I had a pair of those and lost the left one and didn't notice until it was too late. I will just stay with this kind from now on. I like the comfort and I can still hear my book or music when I am on my lawn tractor. Excellent product for me.
customer_reviews.author: MondaysTuesday

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year in and they're already half-broken. Reached out to Otium because they have a warranty and there has been ZERO response. Sound quality: Not horrible, but not that good either. But these are for working out, not Hi-Fidelity Noise cancellation: Pretty horrible. They cancel noise out by being loud. Seriously, even at the lowest volume it was too loud. But now, the audio is so bad that it needs to be almost max and barely anything comes out. Audio constantly changes volume, cuts in and out. Battery: Not great, these die pretty fast. The good part is that they charge pretty fast. Battery life degradation is pretty horrendous though. Don't last nearly asl long as before.
customer_reviews.author: J. WINTER

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working a month in
customer_reviews.text: About a week ago (which was just a month after purchase) these wouldn’t turn on, thought maybe I left them on by accident and they had just died. For the past week I’ve tried charging these with different cables in different outlets but I have now just accepted that they just stopped working out of the blue. Which is a real shame because I really enjoyed using them, super convenient, good quality, great volume. Obviously not worth the money if they only last a month though. Update: customer service has sent me a new pair so I am upgrading to 4 stars because I really did enjoy the headphones. Will update again if I have any other problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Otium Bluetooth Wireless Headphones/Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: This product is an excellent buy! Initially I went from the Senso brand wifi ear buds to these. I've bought three Otium so far! I CAN'T BELIEVE THE PRICE! These ear buds perform really well. Sounds great! It lasts about 7-8 hours per charge. Have used this when I'm at work with no noticeable interference. Setup and Connection to following devices :iPhone was a breeze, Laptop running Windows 10 pro edition - Auto detected and sounds great! Windows 7 pro edition, had to update drivers, but once installed, it works like a champ. Hey for $19.99 you can't beat the performance! it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: GO WITH A DIFFERENT BRAND. Stopped working after ONLY 1 YEAR of use. DISAPPOINTING.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these headphones while they lasted. I received them as a Christmas gift in 2018 and by Christmas 2019 they stopped working. I use them often and take good care of them, so there is no reason why they should have broken. They're fully charged and they work for 30 seconds before turning off abruptly, which means that I have to reconnect them every 30 seconds... no thanks. Now they aren't even turning on. Disappointing. Will buy similar headphones from a brand that offers better quality than one year of use. There are other brands available with same price tag. Purchase elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Wheelwizard

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for two years
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for two years, then wire on one side got loose and essentially headphones stopped working. For the price two years of flawless work, great sound with daily heavy use at the gym is well worth four stars. Bought next gen. from the same seller, no regrets. Pros - batteries hold a charge for about 8 hours of play, super fast charging time, sound quality and volume, easy pairing, lightweight. Cons - sometimes replacements rubber thingy comes off, other than that I was totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: ValB

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and great mic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were on the amazon deal of the day. I tried different brands, but noticed these have better mics for talking. My wife noticed a huge difference in these headphones compared to the other brands I have bought in the past. The mic is clear and she said it sounds like someone speaking to you on their phone's mic. Awesome job on the mic guys! Noise cancellation is great, but isn't as great as other third party brands. But I feel the better mic quality makes up for this. If anything, I can always turn up the volume on the sound for better noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: Toua

customer_reviews.title: Great for hands free phone calls and music for the gym!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not my preferred choice of head phones but never had a problem with them. They last a very long time. Sound is clear and loud. They are comfortable and perfect for the gym or calls. Although picks up alot of background noise during calls. But who's really on the phone for that long to care. I use it for hands free car driving phone calls, watch videos during downtime at work and music for the gym. Very affordable also. I bought three of these so far only because I like to have back ups and I lost them at one point and didn't want to buy anything else because these are really great for what I use them for.
customer_reviews.author: CasCee

customer_reviews.title: a year and a half later, still works
customer_reviews.text: this was probably the 6th pair of bluetooth headphones that I had purchased, and my expectations were low. i had cheap ones that were <$30, and a few in the $80-120 range - all lasted only 2-3 months. i bought this pair in jan. 2019, it is july 2020 now and they still work. i use them almost an hour each day to listen to music while running. they have about 6-7 hrs of battery life and they don't slip out of my ears when i sweat. to say they cancel noise is a stretch, but that's forgivable because the sound quality is good. if they ever die, i'll definitely get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: sari

customer_reviews.title: After months of using these I can see why They have such a rating
customer_reviews.text: I got this pair of Bluetooth earbuds because of the amazon sale for about 11 or 10 dollars. I also saw a youtube video about them. I didn't expect much for the price but after using them on my nights at the gym for almost 4 months I now understand why this has so many reviews. They work. They audio is solid and the noise cancellation while not perfect still does a decent job. Its not perfect with audio but it does a good enough job droning out others in the gym or having to hear weights drop. So I would say if you need gym or workout earbuds give them a try.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Porter

customer_reviews.title: These do wonders to drown out obnoxious co-workers
customer_reviews.text: I work in a cubicle farm and one of my co-workers idolizes a certain pop star who likes to make the bbbrrrdddddddd high pitched sound. Rather than end up with workforce violence charges, I went ahead and bought these bad boys. The sound quality is great. The little battery lasts for several days without needing to be recharged, and the fit is really comfortable. While they do nothing to suppress the rage that bubbles up every time I hear said co-worker clacking up the stairs in her 4 inch heels yelling "HAY GIRL, HAAAAAAAY", they do a pretty good job drowning out the rest of her nonsense if I can get them in and turned on fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: AlyciainTX

customer_reviews.title: Stopped taking a charge after 7 months, but were GREAT while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was 'WAY better than I expected for $19. Since they have the little over the ear deal, they stay where I put them. I haven't been able to find another pair if earbuds that don't constantly fall out. The sound on these does not cut out unless I get more than about 10 or 12 feel from the phone, so if you keep the phone on you, you'll be happy with the connectivity. I tried other sets for $40 and $50 that just didn't perform as well. Hope this helps! EDIT--They won't take a charge after 7 months, so not happy. There is a 1-year warranty, but how to take advantage of it is a mystery.....
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Vandermey

customer_reviews.title: Good, a little awkward
customer_reviews.text: These are a little awkward to put on. You have to figure out L/R, then loop it over your ear, and around the back of your head. And then flip your hair over it if you have long hair. Then get the other side on. Once on they are comfortable. They don't block sound like our Bose noise cancelling earbuds, but they work well enough for most uses. Still deciding if we'll keep them as I purchased these for my 9 year old, and awkward and 9 don't mesh very well. Or I may keep them for myself to get away from all the wires of my ear buds for a fraction of the price of the air pods price.
customer_reviews.author: labdesigner

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far
customer_reviews.text: These connect to my phone with no trouble every time. They fit well in my ears but I will say after a few hours they get a little uncomfortable...I imagine that would be the same with any brand. I like the volume control on the earpiece. Sound quality is great I think, these are the first Bluetooth earbuds I’ve had though. I use them while spraying paint and sanding with an electric sander and I can hear fine over all that noise. So far no trouble and the battery life is pretty good I think. Can’t wait to see how these do over our mower noise in the summer
customer_reviews.author: Krystie

customer_reviews.title: Had them for 2 years, solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm back on this page to buy another set. I had these for a little over two years and yesterday the left side lost sound. A sad day, but overall, for the price, I can't complain. The battery never became an issue for me, these held up snow/rain/sun of the Chicago area. It's not the best sound, but you're not paying for the best sound, so balance cost vs. what you expect to get. They didn't sound bad at all though, I was impressed with the quality. Hopefully the next pair last as long for me, I'll update this review if they do.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable Value
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds pair with my iPhone immediately and effortlessly. They stay in and are, to my surprise, entirely comfortable. The volume up/down/next song/last song controls are intuitive, easy to find, and work flawlessly. They come in a nice zippered case. I was initially very unhappy with the sound quality. The bass was muddy and the vocals fuzzy. Following the recommendation of another reviewer I moved the earbuds out a little bit so that they had a looser seal. Et voila! The sound quality suddenly became quite good. I intend to experiment with the smaller silicone covers to see if they will achieve the same effect.
customer_reviews.author: danarama

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice solid unit especially for the money.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be a solid set of bluetooth earphones. Seems well made and consistent all with good frequency response (the bass is actually shockingly good comparable to much larger headphones).They seal really well and stay in my ear which is usually a problem for me and in-ear phones. Bluetooth range is typical. The bluetooth is a bit loyal to the last device used but will recognize multiple devices. Comes with a nice case and extra ear pads and USB cable. The software seems very robust in how it handles switching to and from other devices and he voice prompts are nice. Seem to be a really good product (not cheap) highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good deal at this price point
customer_reviews.text: A pretty great buy for $20 honestly, I'm just picky. Switched to these after running over my old LG neckband type headset. These don't sound as good for sure, and they amplify the wind if you're running or working in windy conditions. Also, the receiver/earbud size seemed a little larger than what I'd like, but sort of expected. I found I was much happier with the music experience once I did some EQ work (see image). But like I said, for this price, I'd purchase them with no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: John Whiteker

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless sport headphones at great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Was actually better than I expected. Great price, great sound. Have no problems with sweat or retention when working out on the wood pile or operating machinery. Ear cups to fit any ear plus a decent hard case to store the headphones, charge cable, spare ear cups and change in. Update: After using them for a week, I am even more impressed with how well they work. The Bluetooth connects instantly and never drops out. Answers my phone seamlessly and very clearly. Charge lasts all day, and recharges very quickly. I don't think you can find a better product at any price.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but ill-fitting for small (adult) ears.
customer_reviews.text: Got these after buying a similar pair for my husband. He loves his, but I was underwhelmed. I compared sound quality and his were slightly better. I think the biggest attribute is that I have small ears so even with the smallest size rubber ear bud attached they still had the tendency to float just outside and fall out easily because the over-the-ear part is too big. But I struggled to find anything that offered a smaller fit, so I went with these. Pros however were easy bluetooth pairing and function, battery life seems solid so for the cost these are a good value. Worse case scenerio (for me) is my husband has a back up pair.
customer_reviews.author: Anna L. Pleitt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at crazy reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Otium headphones. I purchased almost the same model a year ago. They stopped working all of a sudden and I emailed the company (<support@otiumobile.com>). Though I was out of the one year warranty, they gave me money back for the nonworking headphones (using PayPal credit). I purchased this new pair because I loved the first pair so much. The sound quality is great; they don't move when you're running/jumping and the battery life is pretty good. I use the headphones for 1-2 hours 4-5x/week and I think I charge them maybe once/week. You should buy these for sure-great product and great company!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Takahashi

customer_reviews.title: A good pair of headphones. Truly waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Seller proactively reached out to me and sent me a second pair. At this point, the low battery life of the first pair after 8 hours of daily usage for nearly 6 months is irrelevant. Great customer support! Since i now had two pairs, I decided to submerge the first pair and after a half hour it still works the same. Old review: Battery level was 8 hours a few months ago but now is down to 6 at best. What is with the power-off recording? "Powering off. Your headset is disconnected" I realize it's picky but it really bugs me... Just say "Powering off" and leave out telling me it's disconnected. Of course it's disconnected; it's powered off.
customer_reviews.author: mirknight

customer_reviews.title: For $20, these are hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 sets of these, and they work well enough for my needs. For the price, you really can't expect much more. PROS: -Decent battery life (~7 hours max, which will decay over time) -Decent sound quality. Not spectacular, but probably more than good enough for most people -Fits my ears well and stay in place. And I have weird ears and am picky about this. CONS: -Sometimes has issues connecting, especially if you consistently switch controlling devices. -The "max volume" alert sound is LOUD, high-pitched and painful. There is no reason for this and is a bad design -Outgoing voice quality is mediocre, as you might expect, but clear enough to be understood.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Reliable pairing but neck cord pulls at them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use exclusively with one phone. They always pair immediately because they have never been used with any other device. Like all headphones of this design the neck cord pulls one or the other side while I'm walking or running. They don't fall out because of the ear loops but the ear buds come partially out and have to be adjusted. They do come with a clip that is supposed to help but that didn't work and fell off after 2 runs. I listen to podcasts and the sound is fine for that.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Macdowall

customer_reviews.title: They are exceedingly adequate.
customer_reviews.text: So, I got the item on time, which is good. I kept hearing that they would let you know when they needed to be charged when they were at 30% which would have been notifying me for hours. I am happy to say that is not the case. They warned me about 5 minutes before they needed to be charged. All in all you get about 3 warnings before they just cut out. I wish they would just tell me about how much time they have before they die. That would be more informative. All in all they are decent. The sound quality is good so no real complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DUAL bluetooth connectivity!
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is quite good, BUT not *predictable*. The phone's bluetooth battery indicator still show plenty of charge left when the 'phones are nearly dead - so warnings and shutoff can come as nasty surprise (hence 4 instead of 5 stars). Noise cancellation? Not active. Stuff the things full into your ears and much sound is blocked. Battery life is good, but see above. That the 'phones can connect to two devices is great - I admit I have NOT yet taken full advantage of that, but I like having the option!
customer_reviews.author: Paul P Neubauer

customer_reviews.title: 5 if they were really noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these assuming the noise cancelling part was likely not accurate, but 20.00 for some new headphones, I gave it a whirl. I was correct that these are not electronically cancelling noise, however the good fit of the ear pieces do drown out all the noise at the gym. As for an airplane? Not sure. The sound quality is great (including bass) and the fit is comfortable. You have different sizes to choose from for the ear buds, and I swing the cord behind my head while at the gym. The battery life is good and I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Fits good on the ears and sounds good
customer_reviews.text: These are sweet! Just got a new phone for Christmas, and these paired up excellent with it. I now have a google pixel 3, and these sound very good with it. They are clear sound also. I wanted a pair that hung over my ears, and these get the job done. Price was good to. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for (not much).
customer_reviews.text: The bluetooth connects fine, and the design is slick. However, the audio sounds muffled, and sometimes there is clipping when the bass is about medium-high level. Also, the lowest possible volume setting on these headphones is pretty high - in a quiet room with normal ambient noise, they will noise cancel perfectly, but the actual volume of the music will be simply too loud. The ear-hooks are also fairly flimsy - more flimsy than the ones on a set of Beats. Overall, a good attempt, but the product had too many flaws to keep. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Great while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: Initially I found these headphones decent and acceptable. Now, however, they are essentially worthless. After filling charging, I turn them on and connect to Audible to listen to a book from my library. It all starts well, but then the headphones keep randomly powering off. Sometimes its after several minutes, other times it's only a matter of seconds. The power button isn't being inadvertently pressed either. Basically I have a useless pair of headphones after only 6 months use. BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: tjc10482

customer_reviews.title: Randomly broke!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these headphones, after my first pair retired I started using the second pair. After just a few months of use, they completely broke. They don't turn on, even after I charge it overnight (the blue light is on indicating that it's charging). The right ear speaker doesn't work. Very cheaply made. I had a great experience with my first pair, but this second pair is horrible. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Solid durability at an incredible price
customer_reviews.text: I have used these during many activities such as jogging and hiking. It is just about exactly a year later and only now have they crapped out on me; the left side doesn't work anymore. In my experience, cheaper products don't usually last long but these have been reliable and very durable considering the abuse they endured during my activities. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: iProxymoron

customer_reviews.title: Great for literally anyone. ESPECIALLY college kids!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best damn earbuds I've ever bought. Superb quality, great for college and walking to class, and has a seriously AMAZING battery life. Even if this bad boy is dead. Charge it up for an hour and you'll be able to make it through all those walks to and from classes. Great purchase and could not recommend enough. I personally love them because I lose stuff all the time and with this if I lose them at least they'll be lost together since theyre connected. Love that I can listen to music, take calls, and even (if necessary) listen and charge my earbuds (by using a long cord)
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Otium customer service: A-1
customer_reviews.text: The headphones were so-so. Good bass but mediocre upper midrange and treble. Like listening through cotton balls. The pairing was fast and easy and charging was fast. The fit was comfortable. The best was customer service. Via their website, I told them of my problem with the sound and they answered quickly asking for more info. After giving the order number to them they immediately responded with a way to remedy the situation. Although I had to send the headphones back for refund, I commend their customer service and give them a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Shudder Bug

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on sale for $20 during prime day. Just got mine in the mail, seems like a good build quality on the headphones with good clear sound and decent bass. They claim "water resistant" That's gonna be put to the test while I wear these next time I do the lawn. They came with a carrying case I wasn't expecting which is nice but the zipper is missing a tooth which makes it open without being unzipped. I wasn't expecting the case and this review is about the headphones so I'm maintaining a 5 star rating and we'll see how they perform!
customer_reviews.author: V Utx

customer_reviews.title: Can't complain for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are not actually noise cancelling. I suppose some people might consider these noise cancelling in the same sense that earplugs are "noise cancelling." But true noise cancellation entails bringing in an audio source, then mirroring back the positive and negative rarifications to actually cancel those waves out, resulting in no sound. Saying that these are noise cancelling is 100% a lie. Just being honest here. They need to remove "noise cancelling" from the description since that's false advertising and liars burn in heck.
customer_reviews.author: Moniker

customer_reviews.title: Eh, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is nice, they're comfortable, and the rubber hooks help them stay firmly in place...but the audio quality is awful. Everything sounds like it's far away and coming out of a cheap speaker. I've got $8 earbuds with better audio quality than these. Plus, they are EXTREMELY loud. Even on the minimum audio setting, the audio coming from my iPhone is very loud. And for some reason, the audio will mute if you go below a certain volume level on the phone. Not sure what that's all about. If you need cheap earbuds that will stay in place for jogging/exercise, they're great. But the audio quality is noticeably bad.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend who is a trucker. He is always getting in and out of the truck and works over 10 hours a day. He uses these every day and loves them. They have a great charge and he can hear everything clearly with his phone in his pocket. The only issues he's found is that when he goes to scratch his ear or adjust his hat, it will hit the power button and drop the call. The other issue is that you can't talk on the phone while these are charging.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: SO UNCOMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: They work great. They fit fine. They do everything they're supposed to do. Having said that, they are medieval torture devices for your ears. The most painful thing to shove in your head that doesn't draw blood. Oh my god the pain. It's like the bud part is made from stone. So uncomfortable. Have these people HEARD of earbuds? People don't generally like to shove painful, unyielding superhero killing metals into their most sensitive head orifices. It's like I could go out into the woods, find two pine cones, shove them up my nostrils and then put these earbuds in, and my nostrils would brag to my ears about how much more comfortable they feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Held off on writing this
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews, we went ahead and ordered these anyway because of the price. I held off on writing a review due to reading about all the charging issues. We bought these five months ago and they're still going strong. No issues charging, and they stay in place while jogging and working out. Sound quality is very good, and the only reason they're four out of five is because the noise cancellation isn't quite as advertised (or maybe my husband just listens to his music very loud). Still an excellent deal for the price and will likely order more for myself and others.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Where to begin?? The extra buds. The case, noise cancellation. Everything about their earphones are incredible!! I love them. The string holder broke on the case almost immediately but the case itself is lovely so I'm not bothered much by it. Easy to connect, easy to use. Not sure how to check how much battery is left tho tbh, I just wait until it dies. But yeah I'm super picky with earphones but I use these all the time. Like them more than I thought I would, and so affordable!! I feel like I underpaid lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for low cost
customer_reviews.text: These are a really good bluetooth option for iphones or regular computer connections. Audio quality for listening/talking is good. Noise cancellation is adequate for in-ear; just if you're out walking in the wind, they don't cancel any of that wind-noise out. For the money, these are a no-brainer; I have two similar pairs now, and if either of them eventually go bad I will be back for another. The connection wire is a little annoying at times, but for 1/10th the price of Airpods, no big deal. I tuck them into/under my baseball cap so you don't notice them at all.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND!
customer_reviews.text: I literally just received this morning and love the sound! I purchased the AELEC headphones yesterday tried them and hated the sound. They were way to pitchy, no bass. I need bass with my music and my headphones are all about the music not phone calls. So I thought with the reviews on the Otium they would be better. Then I saw that both headphones are using the same V4.1EDR technology so I was not hopeful. But as soon as I played my 1st song and didn't hear the phone ring at work(thanks noise cancelling) I knew I loved these. Can't wait to work in the yard this weekend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Huge huge huge WOW FACTOR !!!
customer_reviews.text: Never fear. These earbuds are for real. I was somewhat skeptical but quickly put at ease. These wireless headphones are very responsive with more than ample volume and range. Could the bass be a little heavier? Yes...but for just over $20, absolutely impeccable highs and lows. I tested the phone call feature. Works perfectly. Clear voice with one touch answer and hang up. Easily a $100 or more value in this power punch package. If you are on the fence...jump on in. The pool of warm bright vibrant sounds are fine and ready !!! Possible disappointments erased by huge WOW FACTOR !!!
customer_reviews.author: Old_Massey68

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: these headphones are 1 of the best bluetooth units you will find . I was upset when I misplaced the first pair and after using them for over a year every day I knew exactly which headphones to replace them with. the cell phone features are great they fast charging and really last 7- 8 hours on a charge. the sound quality meets and exceeded the advertised specs for me. quick connecting to blue tooth. they are a bit bulky but are very comfortable and they stay put while working out. you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Frank M. Lami

customer_reviews.title: I have several pairs of inexpensive bluetooth headphones and enjoy them allow
customer_reviews.text: Well, that was disappointing. I have several pairs of inexpensive bluetooth headphones and enjoy them allow. One for the gym, home, work, etc. This is the only pair that has greatly under performed. Worked OK for the first couple weeks, but a month after purchase, the battery only lasts a couple hours and then dies. Goodbye Otium headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Dissappointed patron

customer_reviews.title: Battery defective after only 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved it until it failed to take a charge. Only 7 months of light use - an hour or two every few days. It suddenly stopped taking a charge. I wrote to Otium - no response whatsoever - awful customer service. I bought a different brand and will never buy another Otium product! I could complain to Amazon but really not worth it after getting 7 months of use. So if 7 months is long enough for you - go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Designdog

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these at the gym for close to a year. I paid $20 for them and they are well worth it. They get 3-5 hours of use per week and I only need to charge them once per week. The sound is good. I’ve tried $100+ headphones from friends of mine, and the sound quality is better, but not $80+ better. The ear pieces are comfortable. The ear hooks keep them in place well. They function well when my workouts get interrupted by phone calls. When I’m working out hard I sweat like someone is dumping water on me. I’ve never had any problems with these from sweating. I’d buy these again in a second.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Torsell

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if there is any redress regarding this ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if there is any redress regarding this Purchase. I know it was a cheap buy but I have bout stuff that were cheaper that lasted longer. The headphones have only been inside my ears in the gym and in no time at all they are dead to the sound they are supposed to produce. Very disappointing buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jshopaholic

product_meta.title: Otium Bluetooth Headphones, Best Wireless Earbuds IPX7 Waterproof Sports Earphones w/Mic HD Stereo Sweatproof in-Ear Earbuds Gym Running Workout 8 Hour Battery Noise Cancelling Headsets
product_meta.description:
Color:Apple Red

Headphones are a premium product with a number of key benefits: 
- Operating Distance of up to 30ft in Open Space and up to 10ft in Inner Space. 
- Best Noise-Isolating! Unmatched by any other Bluetooth Headphones. 
- Intuitive User Interface Allows a Full Music Control From Headset. 
- Thanks to the Top-Notch Microphone You Would Sounds Great While Talking By Phone. 
- Sleek Design that Takes Aesthetics to a Whole New Level. 
- Quality Build that Guarantees Longevity and Service. 
Don't Settle for Just any Headset with Microphone ! Choose the Best! Clicking "Add to Cart" Now! You Have Absolutely Nothing to Lose. 
What's in the Box:
• Bluetooth Headphone
• Micro USB Charging cable
• 2 Sets of extra ear tips
Tips:
<1> Please charged your headphone when in low battery life to achieve better Bluetooth connection and protect your battery.
<2>Please choose suitable ear tips and wear your headphone tightly when you are running or cycling, it will help you reduce the annoying wind noise.
Attention！！
1.Please use the standard 5V/1A charging plug to charge the headphones.
2.Please don't charge the headphone in your car or use fast charger, otherwise the headphone may broken because of the unstable voltage or excessive current.
3.Please notice that the charging voltage must be not exceed 5.5V and the charging current must not exceed 3A.
feature_bullets: ➤【IPX7 WATERPROOF】Adopting highly sealed shell + nano-coating waterproof technology, its waterproof performance reaches IPX7 waterproof standard, and it is not afraid of sweat attack even if it is used in severe sports. Great for running, hiking, cycling, fitness, yoga, travel, gym etc.

➤【SUPERB SOUND Quality】 headset and Bluetooth V4.1+EDR for stereo sound and superb bass sound. Clear high & low volume. Best wireless earbuds sound.Bulit-in mic with voice notification of incoming calls
➤【UP TO 8 HOURS 】music playing for full battery charge. Super quick charge time with full charge light indication.The headphone battery status will be automatically displayed on the IOS Phone screen.

➤【WITH EASY TO USE BUTTONS】 Allows Skip/Play/Pause on your music tracks as well as all phone use without reaching your phone.
